readable.title: 3251234434_d01e25a50a
readable.content: A warmly dressed woman in black kneels with a small tan dog near a crowd of onlookers . A woman in winter clothing kneels next to a small brown and white dog in the snow . A woman kneeling in the snow attaching a harness on a small tan dog . A woman puts a harness on her small brown dog while in the snow . The woman is holding the harness that the brown and white dog is wearing .
